title: Advanced Multimedia-Based Operating System Memory Management Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge of Computer Architecture and Programming
context.additional_context: In a smartphone-centric limited technological environment, a student-centered learning environment utilizing 2D/3D animations and mobile-compatible content. Conducting PBL assignments per module followed by summative assessments

learning_goals: Visualize and explain memory allocation and garbage collection mechanisms using 3D animation
Write a PBL report comparing paging and segmentation techniques and analyze real-world case studies
Use virtual memory management simulation tools to propose system performance optimization strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
